Class GeoUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.volkswagen.f73.evnavigator.util.GeoUtils

  • public class GeoUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for several calculations around geolocal coordinates.

        Gets the linear distance in Km between two coordinates. Calculation based on movable-type.co.uk

        startLat - origin point latitude
        startLon - origin point longitude
        endLat - destination point latitude
        endLon - destination point longitude
        Returns:

      • calculateRouteTimes

        public static java.time.Duration[] calculateRouteTimes(double meters)
        Returns three different durations in seconds for a distance in meters. Baseline 111 kph, no motorways 88.8 kph, eco 61.05 kph
        Parameters:
        meters - distance in meters
        Returns:
        three Duration values, first one fastest, second one without motorways and third one an eco route
